author: sky.cactus
content: This server isn't the right place for this sort of content.  Remember, this is an R&D server.

author: alexssd7fp
content: Arguably it's related to R&D since Chris is pointing out that liquid staking platforms have a chance to go bust too, which would greatly affect Ethereum

author: pietjepuk
content: but... R&D?

author: pietjepuk
content: You're saying it's arguably relevant to core protocol R&D. Where is the elaboration on the arguments?

author: alexssd7fp
content: It gives a hint that withdrawals should be pushed as soon as possible

author: alexssd7fp
content: Liquid staking as it is was always a hole in Ethereum’s decentralization

author: alexssd7fp
content: They could start dumping all their lido tokens and cause a panic which will lead to unknown consequences

author: alexssd7fp
content: And given that Lido is 30% of Ethereum, this is important

author: alexssd7fp
content: I have no idea what is the point in trying to attack me every time I post anything here that is hinting flaws in the current consensus setup of Ethereum, you start arguments all the times in what I suspect attempts to defend Ethereum as it is. But we should not deny flaws here, we should fix them. That’s what R&D is all about. It isn’t a place for arguments

author: alexssd7fp
content: You attacked me here

author: alexssd7fp
content: Here

author: alexssd7fp
content: And now here

author: alexssd7fp
content: All is ok?

author: pietjepuk
content: I did not make this connection from the "Alameda is dumping LDO" post, at all. Otherwise I agree that withdrawals enable pool stakers to move their stake, without causing a depegging or panic bank-run-type scenario.

author: pietjepuk
content: Agreed, but this is a place for technical discussion on R&D. Not smart contract hacks, not depegging of stable coins, or even depegging of liquid staking derivatives I would say. All very interesting, this Discord is just not the place for discussing it.

author: pietjepuk
content: You acknowledged that I was correcting you, and now you say I was attacking you?

author: pietjepuk
content: Same for this one

author: alexssd7fp
content: Thanks for converting this chat to “pietjepuk arguing with Alex”

author: alexssd7fp
content: Definitely not R&D, so I will not respond to any of your messages on that matter.
